Apenas o CS Classico Remastrizado pelo codigo Source? AI se enganam, com o sistema de proezas e de estatisticas, o jogo ganha uma nova dinamica e possibilita verdadeiros jogadores de shoters de expressarem a sua "skill" libremente, ao contrario do CS:GO, em que os jogadores com mais dinheiro tem armas melhores. Otimo jogo para relaxar, relembrar os velhos tempos e jogar a vontade sem que apareça um jogador com uma arma super rara e cara que saca a vida toda com 1 tiro.

It's great, buy it!

CS:S is a good game where CS:GO got its foundation for a big improvement, you can say 1.6 is the foundation which is really but not really since 1.6 and CS:GO are far from even being able to compare. So it is a better alternative to compare CS:S instead.

CS:S is a fun game nostalgia what the maps looked like when the game was released November 1, 2004. There are some online servers you can play on but nothing direct you should actually join. A lot of plugins and crap you get to download and that way it is easy to get a virus. So try to host your own server with your friends instead and it will be much more fun than that.

Would I recommend this game? Absolutely.

Counter-Strike Source-Это онлайн игра. На данный момент контра это самая знаменитая и популярная игра в сети. Сам оригинал игры(если не ошибаюсь)вышел в 2003 году, а сейчас идут просто разные модификации и сборки.Игра просто шикарная,но отнимает слишком много времени,сейчас иногда захожу что бы вспомнить истинную красоту.В игре одна задача-победить(для этого дается не плохой арсенал оружия, но конкретный ствол стоит конкретную сумму.Сейчас в контре очень много читеров и играть бывает, даже нет желания. Но на хороших серверах стоят хороший таблетки и вот именно на таковых серверах и происходят лучшие игры и турниры.
9.7/10
Самая никчемная игра серии Counter-Strike. По ней даже не проводили большие и частые турниры. Игра была переходом к Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.

Counter Strike Source ist einer der Besten Shooter Klassiker, die bis heute noch mit Global Offensive gut weitergeführt wird. Das ganze Spiel basiert auf das damalige Counter Strike 1.6 und wurde in die Source Engine gut umgewandelt. Mann kan gar nichts gegen den Klassiker falsches sagen. Mit Bomb Defuse und Hostage Resuce sind die Spielmodi etwas mager ausgefallen, obwohl bei 1.6 der VIP Modus gut geklappt hat, (den man mit ensprechenden Mods wieder einführen kann). Aber abgesehen davon ist das Waffenverhalten, Mapdesign und Balancing perfekt. Einer der besten Shooter ohne das lächerliche Lebensregenerationssystem, das sich bis heute mit hoher Spieleranzahl und robustes Spieltechnik halten kann.
Love CS

NO PROBLEMS AT ALL!
My expectations were high consitering the game costs about $20. I aquired the game for free during a sale when I was downloading Garry's Mod a long time back. I never did play it until recently and Im impressed. The game seems to be totally glitch free and runs smoother than even a consol game. If your looking for a COD type shooter with a little more to the maps then this is the place to be! I'd rather play this game than any other FPS on the market today. Essentially when you think multiplayer FPS this is the game. 
10/10

UPDATE:
Roughly a year after first reviewing this game I am still playing it religiously. Mind you I have an xbox one with the most recent COD Black Ops and GTA V. I still find myself playing this. Two steam must haves are this as tell as Team Fortress 2.
Seems to be broken. I shot a guy about...give or take 17 times in the chest and he didn't die. Great for scrims and tournys. I once almost won a motorcycle in one.

On a scare of 8 to 9, I'd have to give this product a 9. It was very nice to play, and 30% of the people with mics were pretty nice. There were some loud obnoxious kids, but that's alright. I mean most of THEM are of Tf2, whining and complaining about how fucking great their lives are. Like that's even true.

An additional downside to the mic players was their genre of personality. Now, this is Valve, so the majority of attention whores on any multiplayer/coop game is of course filled with 12 year olds, bronies, furries, and female mic spammers who yell extra loud so we all know about their extra X Chromozone, which also subjegates the Female X-Box Theory.

Anyways, I barely play this game. It really is nice, and I've had fun every time I've played it, but I really only bought it for GMod. So, yeah.
bought it cause them missing textures in gmod. Still worth it, 10/10.

Counter-Strike:  2014 !!!

Wie in Counter-Strike-Spielen üblich, wird ein Gefecht auf einer begrenzten Map zwischen zwei Gruppen, Terroristen (kurz: T's) und einer polizeilichen Sondereinheit (Counter-Terroristen; kurz: CT's), mit Waffen ausgetragen. Die Art des Gefechtes ist je nach Spielmodus anders. Der Spieler hat im Spiel die Möglichkeit online auf offiziellen Servern oder auf von der Steam-Community erstellten Servern zu spielen. Zudem darf der Spieler selber einen Server hosten, auf welchem er alleine, privat mit anderen Spielern oder mit Bots spielen kann.
